Dashboard.upgradeDescription: Unlock advanced features and increase your savings

Calculator.metaDescription: Calculate landed costs and tariff impacts for your imports with our easy-to-use Emergency Cost Calculator
Calculator.title: Emergency Cost Calculator
Calculator.description: Calculate landed costs and tariff impacts for your products by uploading purchase orders or entering product details manually.
Calculator.fileTypeError: Invalid file type. Please upload CSV, XLSX, or PDF files only.

Planner.title: Supply Chain Pivot Planner
Planner.description: Identify alternative suppliers and optimize your supply chain to minimize tariff impacts.

Optimizer.title: Pricing Strategy Optimizer
Optimizer.description: Model different pricing scenarios to protect margins and communicate changes to customers.

Tracker.title: Tariff Timeline Tracker
Tracker.description: Stay informed about upcoming tariff changes and plan your supply chain in advance.

Router.title: Trade Route Optimizer
Router.description: Find the most cost-effective shipping routes for your imports and exports.

Suppliers.metaDescription: Manage your suppliers, track verification status, and optimize your supply chain with TradeNavigatorPro.
